Posts.Content: I hear you when you talk about the fear of recurrance.  But it is just that...very loathsome and unproductive fear.  Turn the channel when it comes up and live the life you are in.  You know you are doing everything you can to be healthy.  Think healthy, be healthy, love life and your amazing body. I get a lot of feedback from the ovarian cancer group at acscsn.org. Esp. when it comes to meds, and side effects and people's experiences with different drugs.   You may find good support in the breast cancer group there.  It's the american cancer society's cancer survivor network. All the best of good energy and successful, long lasting remission, to you. Paula
